Human Hair Bundles

We use 3 bundles (100g each) to make a wig and usually sell them as 300g bundles.
We also sell 100g bundles separately if required

Types of bundles

Lace Closures

We have a variety of lace closures including:

  • 4x4 lace closures


  • 10x6 (ear-to-ear) lace closures

  • 360 lace closures

Wigs

We have an array of wigs available, including full lace wigs.
